description: This show TVL lacked in Yearn Finance Products

panels.description: Accurate TVL with duplicates funds (funds from a vault deposited into another vault) subtracted includes all networks.

targets.expr: (avg(yearn{network="ETH", param="vecrv balance"}) * avg(yearn{network="ETH", param="crv price"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(yearn{network="ETH", param="tvl"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(yearn_vault{network="ETH", param="tvl"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(yearn_vault{network="FTM", param="tvl"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(iearn{network="ETH", param="tvl"}) or vector(0)) - (sum((yearn_strategy{network="ETH", param="delegatedAssets"} / 1000000000000000000 > 0) * on(vault, version) group_left yearn_vault{network="ETH", param="token price"}) or vector(0))  - (sum((yearn_strategy{network="FTM", param="delegatedAssets"} / 1000000000000000000 > 0) * on(vault, version) group_left yearn_vault{network="FTM", param="token price"}) or vector(0))

panels.title: TVL

panels.description: Aggragate tvl for v2 vaults on $networks

targets.expr: (sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", experimental="false"}) or vector(0)) - (sum((yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="delegatedAssets", experimental="false"} / 1000000000000000000 > 0) * on(vault, version) group_left yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="false"}) or vector(0))

panels.title: V2 TVL

panels.description: $ amount of veCRV Yearn.Finance has locked to boost curve vault yield.

targets.expr: (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"}) or vector(0))

panels.title: veCRV TVL

panels.description: TVL sum of ape.tax experimental vaults on $networks. These vaults are for testing use them with caution.

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks"}) - (sum((yearn_strategy{param="delegatedAssets", experimental="true", network="$networks"} / 1000000000000000000 > 0) * on(vault, version) group_left yearn_vault{param="token price", experimental="true", network="$networks"}) or vector(0))

panels.title: Ape.Tax TVL

panels.description: Amount of funds in old v1 vaults. All tvl is earning 0% apy please migrate asap at yearn.finance.
panels.title: V1 tvl

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn v2 yvaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks"}) - sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks"} offset $tf)

panels.description: $tf tvl % change - yearn v2 yvaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks"}) / sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks"} offset $tf) - 1

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn v2+v3 yEarn on $networks
$tf tvl % change - yearn v2+v3 yEarn on $networks
$tf tvl change - yearn locked veCRV for curve boosts. This is only on the ETH network.

targets.expr: (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"})) - (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"})) offset $tf

panels.description: $tf tvl % change - yearn locked veCRV for curve boosts. This is only on the ETH network.

targets.expr: (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"})) / (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"}) offset $tf) - 1

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn ape.tax vaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks"}) - sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks"} offset $tf)

panels.description: $tf tvl % change - yearn ape.tax yvaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks"}) / sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks"} offset $tf) - 1

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn v1 on $networks. If you have funds in yearn v1 please migrate at yearn.finance you are no longer earning yield, all v1 vaults are 0% apy.
$tf tvl % change - yearn v1 on $networks. If you have funds in yearn v1 please migrate at yearn.finance you are no longer earning yield, all v1 vaults are 0% apy.

targets.expr: (sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl"})) - (sum((yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="delegatedAssets", experimental="false"} / 1000000000000000000 > 0) * on(vault, version) group_left yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="token price", experimental="false"} or vector(0)))

panels.description: Experimental v2 vaults on $network use at your own risk.
panels.title: Ape.Tax TVL

panels.description: Experimental v2 vaults on $network use at your own risk.
panels.title: Ape.Tax TVL

panels.description: Earn v2 and v3 aggregated tvl
panels.title: Earn TVL

list.label: network
list.name: networks

list.label: time frame
list.name: tf
list.query: one day : 1d,one week : 7d,one month : 30d,three months : 90d,one year : 1y

title: Total Value Locked in the Yearn Ecosystem
